import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function Contact() { const { t } = useTranslation(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', mobile: '', category: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // TODO: Implement form submission logic console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

{t('contact.title')}

{t('contact.description')}

{/* Contact Form */}
